content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ اَيَّامَ اْلبِيْضِ سُنَّةً لِلهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu sauma Ayyaamal Bidh sunnatan lillâhi ta‘âlâ.

translation.id: Saya niat puasa Ayyamul Bidh, sunnah karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to fast Ayyamul Bidh, a sunnah practice for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
